          <title>
            <string language="fr">Répondre aux niveaux de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Responding to Light Levels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion auf helle Stufen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resposta aos níveis claros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rispondendo ai livelli chiari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απάντηση στα ελαφριά επίπεδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El responder a los niveles ligeros</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">L'oeil : Répondre aux niveaux lumière.  Animation interactive montrant comment l'oeil répond aux changements des niveaux de lumière.</string>
            <string language="en">The eye: Responding to light levels. Interactive animation showing how the eye responds to changing light levels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oeil</string>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pupille</string>
            <string language="en">pupil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">iris</string>
            <string language="en">iris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Auge: Reaktion auf helle Stufen. 
Interaktive Animationvertretung, wie das Auge auf das Ändern 
der hellen Stufen reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O olho: Resposta aos níveis claros. 
Exibição interativa do animation como o olho responde a mudar 
níveis claros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'occhio: Rispondendo ai livelli chiari. 
Rappresentazione interattiva di animazione come l'occhio 
risponde a cambiare i livelli chiari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μάτι: Απάντηση στα ελαφριά επίπεδα. 
Διαλογική ζωτικότητα που επιδεικνύει πώς το μάτι 
αποκρίνεται στα μεταβαλλόμενα ελαφριά επίπεδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ojo: El responder a los niveles ligeros.
Demostración interactiva de la animación cómo el ojo responde
a cambiar niveles ligeros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
